personalInformation.miniAbout: Hello, I'm Leonardo, student and developer. Welcome to my website!
personalInformation.about: I hold a degree in Computer Science from the Universidade Paulista (UNIP) and work as a developer at TradePro Tecnologia. Additionally, I have post-graduate qualifications in Multiplatform Mobile Development and Cloud Computing Projects from Faculdade Descomplica. Currently, I am engaged in fullstack projects, utilizing programming languages such as Node (TypeScript), React, and Firebase. I am now directing my focus towards enhancing the aforementioned fullstack skills and delving deeper into technologies such as MongoDB, Expo, and especially Next. This shift reflects not only my professional journey but also my ongoing commitment to comprehensive and innovative software development.
